translations: v.交给；支持（hand 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: I tidied up the report before handing it in.
sentences.translation: 我把报告整理好后才呈交。

sentences.sentence: She was bribed into handing over secret information.
She made some cuts before handing over the finished novel.
sentences.translation: 她交定稿之前对小说作了一些删节。
